Package drcl.inet.protocol.aodv

Class Summary
AODV AODV.java: the main part of AODV protocols.
AODV_Packet This class implements a generic AODV packet.
AODV_RERR AODV Route Error (RERR) packet body ref: Sec. 4.3 Note: type = 1
AODV_RREP AODV Route Reply (RREP) packet body ref: Sec. 4.2 Note: type = 1
AODV_RREQ AODV Route Request (RREQ) packet body ref: Sec. 4.1 Note: type = 1
AODV_RTEntry AODV_RTEntry.java AODV routing Entry dedicated for AODV usage.
AODV_TimeOut_EVT Class AODV_TimeOut_EVT Class for handling tiom out event The timeout event objects dedicated for AODV package.
UIUCInjector UIUCInjector.java: The fault injection component for AODV packets.
